content.text:
Ready for action! I'm Claude Code, your file search specialist for this Tauri desktop application codebase. I've noted the working directory and git status.

I can efficiently:
- Search for files using glob patterns
- Find code and text with regex
- Read and analyze file contents
- Navigate the multi-package structure (desktop Tauri app, UI, Go backend, website)

The repo currently has several modified files across the Tauri source, React UI components, Go backend services, and website assets. There are also some new untracked files related to inference, tools, and feedback functionality.

What would you like me to search for or analyze?
